oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Introducing milk quality services to your practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Earnest, Scott
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: milk quality
mastitis
consulting
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Milk quality services are an excellent and often-overlooked opportunity for veterinarians to improve the profitability of their clientsâ€™ dairies and their practice. There are a number of simple procedures and services you can perform without substantial investment in equipment. These include milk culture services at your clinic, utilization of DHI test data in your herd health appointments, on-farm audits of environment, procedures, and cow outcomes, DairyComp data analysis, and employee training.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Recent Graduate Proceedings ; 46-48
